1437218776051769344.text:
At one of her last birthdays, we held 'Gwennfest' to have one last great party. Today, instead of being sad, I’m trying to capture that spirit, and smile thinking of all the good times. It’s hard, but it’s what mom would have wanted. 

We love and miss you, mom.

1437218774600634374.text:
Her biggest fear was that we would forget her — but there’s not a chance that could happen. 

She remains a big influence on my family, and she always will.

1437218773111554054.text: All she really wanted to do was speak about or see us and my kids. There was no more loving (or fun) grandmother. She loved to spoil my kids, and they still talk about her all the time.

1437218771375120386.text: Mom loved people and her smile lit up a room; she was always the life of the party. She was taken from us far too soon, but she faced her disease and last years with absolute grace and dignity.

1437218769856778242.text: I was blessed. Mom was always there for me and my sister. She never missed a game or an event — or an opportunity to be supportive. She was my biggest champion and number one fan.

1437218767419883521.text: It’s hard to believe that it’s been three years since we lost my mom. There isn’t a day that goes by that I don’t think of her, miss her deeply, and recognize a simple truth: but for mom’s love and guidance, I wouldn’t be in Congress, or, frankly, have achieved anything. https://t.co/amUkig1joE

1392556483255152641.text: SALT can help middle class folks lower their taxes here in NJ.

1392556480663101441.text:
Reminder: Northern NJ is, unfortunately, a high-tax high-cost area.

A middle class married couple — say, a teacher & a cop making the average salary for the area — could have had a SALT deduction of more than $17,000 before the 2017 cap.

But in 2017 their taxes went up.

This emergency package provides critical lifelines, including:

✅ $600 stimulus checks per individual

✅ $284 billion for a second round of PPP
✅ $25 billion in rental help & eviction moratorium
✅ $13 billion for SNAP & child nutrition

The House has passed school bus safety provisions I originally introduced — with the support and guidance of Miranda Vargas' family — to get three-point lap-and-shoulder seatbelts on school buses nationwide.

Watch more here from @News12NJ here: https://t.co/Du5Yx8rBW4

1283160806046269442.text: Rabbi Chanoch, thank you for looking after our community and for being a true leader. #NJ5HometownHeroes

1283160801558355973.text:
HOMETOWN HERO SPOTLIGHT: 

Thank you to Rabbi Chanoch Kaplan — a staple in the Franklin Lakes area community as a Rabbi for more than 20 years. During the pandemic, Rabbi Kaplan organized the Chabad of Northwest Bergen County to donate food, N95 masks, & items to those in need. https://t.co/D7wXMskMit

1283100773585489920.text:
This week, I was proud to host #NJ5 students for my first ever virtual U.S. Capitol tour! 

We were able to view 3D maps of the Capitol Rotunda, Old Supreme Court, Statuary Hall, the House Chamber, & more.

Stay tuned for the full video and thank you to everyone who attended! https://t.co/3L6CSwBNrt

1283081997489971201.text: I'm grateful for the Vargas' family support and strength, and all of their advocacy to help keep our children safe. (3/3)

1283081996630142978.text:
...to help keep our children safe going to and from school.

I'm proud that the infrastructure bill recently passed by the House included my common-sense three-point seatbelt provision — requiring the same seatbelt we have in our cars. (2/3)

1282792213265764354.text: The deadline for small businesses to apply for PPP is extended to Aug. 8th! At the start of July, PPP had $131 billion left and NJ businesses have already received $17 billion worth of loans. (1/2)
